title: Spare £30m? Here's our pick of the newest superyachts from the Monaco Yacht Show
text:
Looking for an ice-cracking superyacht for your adventure to Antarctica? Or perhaps you’d prefer to experience the cold stuff in the comfort of your onboard snow room, after a sauna? Or are you just looking for a submarine, designed to match your sports car’s livery, to pop on the aft deck? In any case, the Monaco Yacht Show is the place to go super-shopping.

This year, among the 125 superyachts on display – with a combined value of €4 billion and an average price of €37.8 million – the world’s top shipyards debuted 44 new models, 14 of which were more than 70 metres long. The three biggest new superyachts at this year’s event show what you can get for your money, when money is no object.

Tis...
description: Looking for an ice-cracking superyacht for your adventure to Antarctica?
